[bq="HJSDGCE"]"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557660dc636872177e0004a7#post_557660dc636872177e0004a7
My biggest problem is motivation.
I only draw good when I have nothing else to do. Being under pressure also works to make me draw.

Which is why I like school.[/bq]
Me personally I just don't have a lot of time.

I have to cram 6 months of college into one month and learn java at the same time.
